message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $18,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, even at this price point.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I understand your point, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $14,000. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
